About Veronica

Born on February 19, in Lagos state, Nigeria, Veronica Oluwatunmise, Adeusi is a First-class graduate of Accounting from Redeemer’s University, Ede, Osun State in Nigeria and a Chartered Accountant in the Institute of Chartered Accountants of Nigeria (ICAN). She has harnessed cognate experience as a Credit and Financial Analyst and she currently works as a Financial Analyst in Lagos state of Nigeria.

She is passionate about helping teenagers and young adults identify their unique potentials and will remain committed to sharing her experiences using different platforms, one of which is through writing. She was one of the winners of the Tolutoludo book review in 2020 and her hobbies are to read wide and create beautiful contents.

Veronica’s New Book

FINDING THE SILVER LINING

In finding yourself, you need to be prepared for the good, the bad and the ugly that life will throw at you because it wouldn’t just be as a bed of roses or the walk in the park that you wish it would be. With this in mind, there is need to understand that after dark clouds and heavy rain, there is usually that beautiful ray of light, that of hope and remembrance that whatever happened prior is for the good to be revealed. With 25 lessons, Finding the silver lining will take your through major experiences in the life of the author on her journey to finding the silver lining and she would love that you learn from it as well.

Price: Ebook - N1000 | Paperback - N2000
